import './book.css'; import Navbar from '../Components/navbar.js'; import {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function Book(){ const [firstName,setFirstName]=useState('') const [lastName,setLastname]=useState('') const [mail,setMail]=useState('') const [guestCount,setGuestCount]=useState(); const [arrivalDate,setArrivalDate]=useState(''); const [arrivalTime,setArrivalTime]=useState(''); const [pickup,setPickup]=useState(true) const [contactNo,setContactNo]=useState(); const [departureDate,setDepartureDate]=useState(''); const [departureTime,setDepartureTime]=useState(''); const chnagePickUp=()=>{ setPickup(false); } const createBooking=()=>{ const data={ firstName, lastName, mail, guestCount, arrivalDate, arrivalTime, departureDate, departureTime, pickup, contactNo } axios.post('http://localhost:5555/booking',data) .then(alert("done")) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:5555/booking') .then((res)=>{console.log(res.data)}) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) }) return(
setFirstName(e.target.value)}/> setLastname(e.target.value)}/>
{/* setGuestCount(e.target.value)}/> */}
setArrivalDate(e.target.value)}/> setArrivalTime(e.target.value)}/>
setDepartureDate(e.target.value)}/> setDepartureTime(e.target.value)}/>
setPickup(e.target.value)}/>Yes setPickup(e.target.value)}/>No
setMail(e.target.value)}>
setContactNo(e.target.value)}>
) }
